name: MTLSamplePosition
desc: A sample position on a subpixel grid.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new sample position on a subpixel grid.

items.name: init(x: Float, y: Float)
items.desc: Returns a new sample position on a subpixel grid at specified coordinates.

items.name: var x: Float
items.desc: The x position of the sample on the subpixel grid.

items.name: var y: Float
items.desc: The y position of the sample on the subpixel grid.
